verses.roman:
ātmā haite kṛṣṇa bhakte baḍa kari' māne
ihāte bahuta śāstra-vacana pramāṇe

synonyms: ātmā haite—than His own self; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; bhakte—His devotee; baḍa kari' māne—accepts as greater; ihāte—in this connection; bahuta—many; śāstra-vacana—quotations from revealed scripture; pramāṇe—evidences.
translation: Lord Kṛṣṇa considers His devotees greater than Himself. In this connection the scriptures provide an abundance of evidence.
